questions.question: What are the reasons why blockchains are famous?
options: A) blockchain provides a feature of digitization
B) blockchain provides a feature of trust
C) blockchain provides a feature of immutability

questions.question: Who should get into blockchain?
options: C) both technical and non-technical people
D) no one needs a technical background

questions.question: What are the prerequisites for blockchain?
What is the main advantage of using a modular design in web development?
Which of the following is NOT a best practice for coding style?
What is the purpose of a Content Delivery Network (CDN)?
options: C) To increase website speed and availability

questions.question: Which of the following is a benefit of using a version control system?
options: A) Improved collaboration among team members

questions.question: What is the main difference between HTTP and HTTPS?
options: A) HTTP uses encryption while HTTPS does not
B) HTTPS uses encryption while HTTP does not

questions.question: Which of the following is a best practice for error handling?
options: A) Raising exceptions and letting the program crash
B) Ignoring errors and continuing execution
C) Logging errors and notifying administrators
D) Returning an error message to the user

questions.question: What is the purpose of a security audit?
options: A) To identify vulnerabilities in the system
B) To test the system's performance
C) To ensure compliance with regulations
